column2: "Ehehe, I came up with a really interesting idea! Let's pack all kinds of items into bags and have people take random ones!"
"I've already thought of a few things to put in, sweets, good luck charms, that kind of thing... But I want to include something fun!"
"Something to surprise and excite people when they open the bag... Got any ideas?"

"会場の飾りつけが始まったときに
どこからともなく、急に現れて
暴れだしたんだって。"

"このままじゃ、準備どころか
イベントの開催も危ぶまれちゃう！"

"イベントを開催するためにも
暴れている敵たちを
追い払ってきてほしいの！"
